name: Compound FX
slogan: Specialist compound positioning and trading platform startup
description:
The Compound FX trading system is a highly specialist compound positioning, hedging and trading algorithm; it is an automated system that is overseen and managed by dedicated and experienced professionals of the highest calibre.

The program trades on pre-defined currency pairs.

It has many parameters that are required to be met before it will place a trade.

These include:
VOLUME AND LIQUIDITY
MARKET TREND
INSTITUTIONAL SUPPORT AND RESISTANCE LEVELS

The most advanced aspect of the program is its ability to compound position and hedge a negative position to close out in profit. This ensures that drawdown is not recorded as a loss on the account, but only holds a negative position.

These positions will always close out in profit because the algorithm will calculate new positions at key levels, which have a higher leverage. This allows a profitable outcome when the market retraces.

jobs.title: Forex Trader / Account Manager / Tech Support
jobs.description:
Forex focused Fintech Start-up with offices in Central London and Southampton urgently require a number of professionals to join their team on either a contract, permanent or ad-hoc basis.

With previous experience in Forex Trading and supporting high net worth individuals the successful candidates will be highly knowledgeable within Foreign Exchange Trading, Compound Interest and Positioning, Hedging, Trading Software & Platforms, Volume and Liquidity, Market Trends and Institutional Support and Resistance Levels.

The sole focus of the position is to provide unrivalled advice and support to the customer base explaining how the platform operates at any given time and guiding customers through any steps undertaken always explaining things in a measured and informative manner.

The majority of clients already on-board predominantly have no previous experience of the Foreign Exchange market or trading platforms of this nature and at times are likely only to need reassurance that all is as it should be and have an explanation as to why. Again being an effective communicator is key alongside specialist knowledge.

Customer support cases or sales opportunities are raised by the business and filtered through to the successful candidate and providing certain SLA's are met and the customer is happy the individual concerned is free to manage this how they wish.

There really are exciting times ahead and if you have the skills aforementioned we would like to talk to you. Don’t delay and apply today!
